data.title: Climates and Constellations
data.meta_description: Climates and Constellations - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document contains 30 multiple choice questions about various topics relating to climate and weather, astronomy, and other earth science concepts. The questions cover different climates and the factors that influence them, such as temperature, precipitation, altitude, latitude, and proximity to bodies of water. Additional questions cover topics like global warming, the greenhouse effect, stars, constellations, and how the rotation and revolution of Earth and other celestial bodies affects what we observe in the night sky.
